column5: Interesting Star article this morning.  Have a read: http://www.thestar.com/news/sciencetech/science/article/839788--a-front-row-seat-to-evolution-at-your-local-stream
It would be awesome if they could actually get the picture right.
I would love to get paid to watch fish in a stream, and come up with reasons why their behaviour is worthy of scientific discussion.
good read. posted yesterday by slashhopper tho. it's just a few threads under this one  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=45658
